info.description: Connects to Zenkraft API to create/manage/track shipments from 50+ Different carriers
info.title: Zenkraft

post.description: Cancels a shipment with a given shipment ID or tracking number
Sends a command to print the shipping label based on the base64 string

get.description: Request returns credentials, the list of available printers, their trays and some additional data.

post.description: Obtains available shipping rates based on shipping accounts provided.
Books a shipment with a carrier and returns a shipping label.
Tracks a shipment with a carrier and returns the checkpoints.
